name: The Last Sky
description:
"Are you feeling fear, uncertainty, and doubt, Jake?
said the Shaman as Jake took a seat by the fire.
"Yes, but I think I've come to the right place" replied Jake.



The Last Sky is a game about finding peace amidst chaos, balance among the extremes, love inside of fear, clarity in endless delusions, and forgiveness within anger.



The game combines elements of room-escape puzzles with 2D platforming into a narrative-focused adventure following Jake and his inner struggle with trauma. An enigmatic shaman, Tarak, promises to guide Jake on a journey to the source and thrusts him deep into a subconscious dream. It is up to you to help Jake make sense of the strange world he finds himself in and guide him towards the future based on the choices you make.
